title: Red's Throw
summaries: Red's Throw is an Expert Mode-exclusive yoyo. It is obtainable from any Hardmode boss's Treasure Bag (except Queen Slime's) as part of Red's set. Like The Eye of Cthulhu, Code 2, Valkyrie Yoyo, Kraken, and Terrarian, Red's Throw can be held in the air indefinitely.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Sell: 4 GC
